version_description:
- Unlock of full functionality by hardware now works consistently and across all platforms
- Dropbox functionality restored

- Link up to 4 iPhones (and iPad/iPod Touch) via Wi-Fi, then start recording and playback, add metadata, set Input levels, monitor audio and more all from one Master.
- iPad layout with split screen and slide-over capability
- More Sharing Options: share Scenes via AirDrop or open in other apps; share Takes directly in full resolution or AAC compressed.
- Safe Screen ensures that no controls are inadvertently triggered (when, for example, the iPhone is in your pocket) and preserves battery life.
- Edit Markers directly on the waveform.
- Input level always visible for easier access.

- Support for Sennheiser MK4 digital, connecting will unlock the Full Version (single device)
- Bug fixes, fix for MetaRecorder launching when recognized device connected

Auto Input Config - Recording format adjusts automatically to the connected audio hardware
Optimized for iPhone X
Watch functionality updated
Dropbox functionality updated
General bug fixes

Support for Timecode Systems UltraSync BLUE - Using the UltraSync BLUE, you can wirelessly sync MetaRecorder and your iPhone to a wide variety of audio and video devices.
Support for Apogee Jam+, MiC+ and HypeMic
Simplified Scenes

Improved VoiceOver performance.
Support for Bluetooth headphones.
Watch app updated: Record button Complication, Series 4 screen optimization.
AMBEO Smart Headset unlocks Unlimited Single Device recording
Blue Timecode performance improvements

now compatible with iOS 14
resolves an issue with the MetaRecorder Watch app

- All Apogee products including Symphony Desktop now unlock Metarecorder on iPhone/iPad/iPad Pro
- Fixed Link feature broken in iOS 14
- general bug fixes
